title: Sound On: Debt Deal, Biden Meeting with Putin
itunes:title: Sound On: Debt Deal, Biden Meeting with Putin
description:
Guests: Rep. Michael McCaul of Texas, Michael Hardaway, founder of Hardaway Wire, Kevin Walling, Democratic Strategist at HG Creative Media, Bloomberg Government Congress reporter Jack Fitzpatrick and Bloomberg Politics Contributor Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
